title: On Critical Race Theory with Liam Bright
description:
For the past few months Liam and I have been exchanging letters on the subject of Critical Race Theory. We thought it could be fruitful to discuss out experience, and go over any unanswered questions

Listen on podcast here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/On-Critical-Race-Theory-with-Liam-Bright-ednjb1
Our letter conversation can be found here: https://letter.wiki/conversation/322
Liam's Covid blog list mentioned in the beginning: https://sootyempiric.blogspot.com/2020/04/the-masque-of-rona.html
Follow Liam on twitter @lastpositivist
Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
